name: Proto Tower 254
description: Another sigil - playing around with some of the visual cues I get when thinking about how urbit and other decentralized operating systems are architected. The idea of sort of building something over the top of a consistent substrate - but instead of software it's little societies. Anyways, this one was livestreamed, thanks for watching madcat. Also this was grayscale again because I told myself that I would use grayscale or B&W until Jekyll or Hyde is minted out. This is the importance of having collabs, because without collab deployments, this collection is would be be very monochrome for the forseeable future â¬›â¬œ
